nearlmod:CureUp.NAME: Healing Boost
nearlmod:CureUp.FLAVOR: Her allies will not be affected as long as she is at the front.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b5 #yblock you gain each turn will be converted to #yTemporary #yHP .

nearlmod:PegasusHalo.NAME: Pegasus's Halo
nearlmod:PegasusHalo.FLAVOR: As long as she is on the battlefield, no one can snatch victory from us.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replace #rHealing #rBoost . Every time you gain #b4 #yBlock, gain #b1 #yTemporary #yHP .

nearlmod:Marigold.NAME: Marigold
nearlmod:Marigold.FLAVOR: Perhaps you are not the light itself, but once, you drew your sword to protect it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, summon Viviana as #yFriend .

nearlmod:EmergencyCallBook.NAME: Emergency Call Book
nearlmod:EmergencyCallBook.FLAVOR: All the base stations are destroyed, you are the last one.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b1 #yDP .

nearlmod:FirstAidMode.NAME: First Aid Mode
nearlmod:FirstAidMode.FLAVOR: The knight isn't used to the insurmountable foe, but the willingness to act in defense of others, has sufficed.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #yFirst #yAid into your hand and apply #yRetain and #yExhaust to it.

nearlmod:KnightFamily.NAME: 'Knight Family'
nearlmod:KnightFamily.FLAVOR: We all dwell in the shadows, as ever before.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die for the first time in each combat, reduce #b60% Max HP and heal to Max HP instead. Gain #b3 #yStrength and will not lose HP this turn.

nearlmod:UpgradedCoreCaster.NAME: Upgraded Core Caster
nearlmod:UpgradedCoreCaster.FLAVOR: It's a Minoan beauty forged of D32 Steel. The ultimate in Originium Arts conductivity!
DESCRIPTIONS: The damage dealt and #Block gained by #yLight increase #b4 .

nearlmod:BackupEquipment.NAME: Backup Equipment
nearlmod:BackupEquipment.FLAVOR: Employing different weapons for different enemies is also a tactic.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, you can choose your initial stance.

nearlmod:HandOfConqueror.NAME: Hand of Conqueror
nearlmod:HandOfConqueror.FLAVOR: Victory in itself is the best sustenance.
DESCRIPTIONS: After #yFatal , damage you dealt increase #b1% forever.

nearlmod:Lighthouse.NAME: Lighthouse
nearlmod:Lighthouse.FLAVOR: Journey towards the lighthouse, and also to where the lighthouse vanishes.
DESCRIPTIONS: In the same turn, whenever you played #b3 card of same type, the next card of same type costs #b0 .

nearlmod:LateLight.NAME: Late Light
nearlmod:LateLight.FLAVOR: Everything has passed the point of no return.
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot summon Blemishine as #yFriend anymore.

nearlmod:Revenge.NAME: Revenge
nearlmod:Revenge.FLAVOR: The Left-hand Knight achieved his 'revenge'. To him, a victory without honor is no different.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 2 #yLeft-hand #yMark.

nearlmod:NormalPerson.NAME: The Mediocre One
nearlmod:NormalPerson.FLAVOR: Viviana did not find the knight of her dreams.
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot summon Viviana as #yFriend anymore.

nearlmod:ImaginaryFear.NAME: Imaginary Fear
nearlmod:ImaginaryFear.FLAVOR: The young Nightzmora has never seen any mountains of corpses or seas of blood for himself. Yet his lineage taught him how to control fear the moment he was born.
DESCRIPTIONS: After the first turn of each combat, take 8 damage.

nearlmod:BloodEntangle.NAME: Blood Entangle
nearlmod:BloodEntangle.FLAVOR: The pool of blood seems to congeal into sticky silk strands, tangling themselves around limbs. The blood flowing through body resonates with its compatriot, causing a tingling pain.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, summon #b1 #yBlood #yBlade as additional enemy.
